function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Model 1 not adjusted for employment status in models estimating sickness benefit transfers","Impact":"Misrepresentation of the impact of employment status on sickness benefit transfers","Mitigation":"Ensure that employment status is adjusted for in models estimating sickness benefit transfers","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and analysis software","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Model 2 not adjusted for chronic conditions, any psychiatric condition, and physical activity","Impact":"Misrepresentation of the impact of chronic conditions, psychiatric conditions, and physical activity on the outcome","Mitigation":"Adjust for chronic conditions, any psychiatric condition, and physical activity in the model","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and analysis software","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
